attributes.action: Stop the new EU rule of clubbing to death the innocent animal victims used for heinous torture in the name of progress
attributes.additional_details: Please do not sanction or allow this new EU regulation of clubbing to death these poor and ill used cats dogs and other animals. We were always supposed to be animal lovers in this country but millions of these animals have terrible "scientific" experiments done on them, are left in great pain and trauma, but now it seems that clubbing them to death is the way we deal with them when they have given their utmost. It is wicked and barbaric. I fear that man is becoming very like his ancient ancestors.
